動物用藥品名稱: 龍馬躍雞新城病、傳染性華氏囊病不活化混合疫苗
業者名稱: 台灣龍馬躍股份有限公司
效能(適應症): 預防雞隻感染新城病及傳染性華氏囊病。
ingredients: NEWCASTLE DISEASE VIRUS, INACTIVATED, PRE-INACTIVATION TITER OF ATLEAST 10^8.0EID50;GUMBORO DISEASE VIRUS, INACTIVATED, PRE-INACTIVATION TITER OF ATLEAST 10^5.7CCID50; MERTHIOLATE AT MOST 0.015MG; OILY EXCIPIENTQS 0.3ML.Newcastle disease virus (Ulster 2C strain)≧10^8.0 EID50Infectious bursal disease virus(VNJO strain)≧10^5.7 CCID50
